attributes.magic: PE32+ executable (console) x86-64, for MS Windows

threat_severity.level_description: Severity HIGH because it was considered hacktool. Other contributing factor was that it could not be run in sandboxes.

exiftool.ImageFileCharacteristics: No relocs, Executable, No line numbers, Large address aware

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description:
Detects usage of NimScan, a portscanner utility.
In early 2025, adversaries were observed using this utility to scan for open ports on remote hosts in a compromised environment.
This rule identifies the execution of NimScan based on the process image name and specific hash values associated with different versions of the tool.

match_context.values: @{Hashes=MD5=9ADBAED8FE8106AE41229CCA8BAB7C83,SHA256=E43D66B7A4FA09A0714C573FBE4996770D9D85E31912480E73344124017098F9,IMPHASH=41BB1C7571B3A724EB83A1D2B96DBB8C; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\george\Desktop\; EventID=1; ParentCommandLine="C:\Program Files (x86)\Joebox\control\joeboxcontrol.exe"; CommandLine="C:\Users\george\Desktop\program.exe" ; ParentImage=C:\Program Files (x86)\Joebox\control\joeboxcontrol.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Users\george\Desktop\program.exe}
